question: Display adventure movies and action movies directed by Sofia Martinez.
sql_query1:
SELECT Adventure_Movies.title
FROM Adventure_Movies
WHERE Adventure_Movies.Director = "Sofia Martinez"
UNION
SELECT Action_Movies.title
FROM Action_Movies
WHERE Action_Movies.Director = "Sofia Martinez"
sql_query2:
SELECT Adventure_Movies.title
FROM Adventure_Movies
UNION
SELECT Action_Movies.title
FROM Action_Movies
WHERE Action_Movies.Director = "Sofia Martinez"
interpretation1: What adventure movies and action movies are directed by Sofia Martinez?
interpretation2: List all adventure movies and also show action movies directed by Sofia Martinez.
